name: March of the Abyss (itsVehx)
description:
March of The Abyss is a Necromancer Diablo 3 with a Warcraft 3 inspired theme. The game gives a linear experience, where the player follows the story of the Elmore Turass. This demo was developed in Unity for the University of East London. Features of level design are demonstrated in the Gameplay Video made.

For this group project I was in the role of Level Design Lead. My role included co-ordinating the games development with other sectors such as programmers. I was responsible for creating the story for the game as well as create our own assets for the game. Additionally, I was responsible for the segments of the game being ready on time to allow programmers to create a script. 

Production & Art Lead, UI, SFX, and Narrative Assistant - Norbert Csécs

Design Lead, Level Building, Animation Assistant - Olafs Matjusenoks

QA Lead, Design, Animation and Programming Assistant - Manuel Bonnet

Programming Lead, VFX Artist, Production, Design Assistant - Christian Staley
